Name: Niacinamide Bamboo Sheet Mask with Niacinamide & Ginger Extract for Clear & Glowing Skin - Pack of 2 (25 g * 2)
Discription: Niacinamide Bamboo Sheet Mask with Niacinamide & Ginger Extract for Clear & Glowing Skin - Pack of 2 (25 g * 2)Sheet masks are a super satisfying, convenient, and fun way to give your skin some TLC at home. Your skin gets an instant boost of suppleness because each sheet mask is packed with nine days of serum hydration. Formulated with the power of Niacinamide and Ginger, the sheet mask will also help your skin tone and texture, and it’s proven to reduce acne marks & scars.Mamaearth sheet masks are extremely gentle and safe for you because they are made from bamboo, unlike other sheet masks that are made of polyester - a first for India. They’re biodegradable, making them good for you and good for the environment! The sheet mask is suitable for all skin types, is free of alcohol & harmful toxins such as Parabens, Mineral Oil, Silicones, etc.
